name: Sneekee
description:
Sneak around evil-robot-land and save the day. Don't get scanned!

CONTROLS

  • A - Move left
  • D - Move right
  • SPACE - Jump
  • CONTROL - Throw rock
  • LEFT CLICK - Sword attack
  • RIGHT CLICK - Shuriken attack

TIPS

  • When a robot scans a rock, it will stay still for a few seconds. 
  • After a robot scans a rock, it will continue moving in the same direction it was moving before, and move a bit further.
  • If you throw a rock near a platform border, the robot will scan it and fall afterwards.
